meanings.definition: Tease (the hair) by combing it towards the scalp to give it more volume.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys backcombing her hair to make it look fuller.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to do backcombing to add volume to my hair.
meanings.sent3: After backcombing her hair, she looked like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her backcombing skills turned her flat hair into a majestic mane.
meanings.sent5: The stylist demonstrated backcombing to create a glamorous hairstyle.

meanings.definition: The act of combing the hair towards the scalp to give it more volume.
meanings.sent1: Backcombing is a common technique used in hairstyling.
meanings.sent2: I noticed her hair had more volume after the backcombing.
meanings.sent3: The backcombing session at the salon made everyone's hair poofy.
meanings.sent4: In the world of hair, backcombing is like magic for volume.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show featured intricate backcombing styles on the runway.
